objectiveMessage:
Alright! Looks like we want to calculate how broke... I mean monthly mortgage payments for that house you can totally afford.

userNameInput:
Well lets first get acquainted, I may be a few lines of code but you can think of me as your friendly mortgage calculator. What do the humans call you
 Enter Your Name:
loanAmountResponse:
The first step we need to take together is you telling me the LOAN AMOUNT you plan on begging the banks for this fancy new house?
 Enter Loan Amount:
loanDurationResponse:
Cool Cool, now I think the next step is going to be getting your bank account info... wait I mean the loan duration.
Enter the Loan Duration:(Months)
aprResponse:
Alright, obviously the banks would be crazy not to give you the money. Whats that APR looking like?
Enter your Annual Percentage Rate:(Example 7% = 0.07)
